alert.note: Alert for Hickman (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 1:17AM CST until February 06 at 11:20PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... Duck River At Centerville affecting Hickman County. For the Duck River...including Manchester, Shelbyville, Pottsville, Milltown, Columbia, Centerville, Hurricane Mills...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Duck River At Centerville. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flood waters will cover the flood plain along the river. Several roads near the river will be partially covered. In Centerville, Hickman Springs Road and Defeated Creek Road will be affected. Leatherwood Road between Shady Grove and Primm Springs near Tottys Bend will also be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 13.7 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 23.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 730 PM CST.
